about_the_game:
Farm Station it is a game where we play the role of the eccentric owner of Farm Station.
Our daily duties include taking care of providing supplies for the store, customer service and also repairing their machines.

A good job pays off in popularity among customers!
The functioning of Farm Station depends on your decisions!
It is your decision how you will treat the customers, whether you want to be nice and fair with customers, or on the contrary, rough and surly!
The game has a pet manager system. They help you with everything! Don’t forget to take care of bond with them, then pets will be more helpful.
The action of the game is in the late 1970s. You will feel this atmosphere through the reproducing of the realities of that time. Starting from the realistic work of the cash register, and fuel distributor to huge agricultural machines.

name: Farm Station

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows(64-bit) 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 760 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows(64-bit) 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600K / AMD Ryzen 7 1700X
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Farm Station – Develop and innovate the farm, make repairs, and take care of customer service. Remember that your pets and workers help you. Order and sell a diverse assortment, from seeds to huge harvesters! Watch out for robbers, they take advantage of inattention moment for sure!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Romanian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
